Package org.apache.hadoop.contrib.index.example

Class Summary
HashingDistributionPolicy Choose a shard for each insert or delete based on document id hashing.
IdentityLocalAnalysis Identity local analysis maps inputs directly into outputs.
LineDocInputFormat An InputFormat for LineDoc for plain text files where each line is a doc.
LineDocLocalAnalysis Convert LineDocTextAndOp to DocumentAndOp as required by ILocalAnalysis.
LineDocRecordReader A simple RecordReader for LineDoc for plain text files where each line is a doc.
LineDocTextAndOp This class represents an operation.
RoundRobinDistributionPolicy Choose a shard for each insert in a round-robin fashion.
